alldb.table_sql:
SELECT TT.ID AS ID_, '{sourceDesignerId}' AS SOURCEDESIGNERID, '{workflownameparent}' as WORKFLOWNAMEPARENT, TT.REJECTDESIGNERID AS REJECTDESIGNERID, TT.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME_, TT.TYPEPOSITION AS TYPEPOSITION_, TT.POSITION AS POSITION_, TT.DISPLAYNAME AS DISPLAY_NAME_, TT.CODE AS CODE_, TT.KEY_ AS KEY_, TT.VERSION AS VERSION_, TT.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION_, TT.QUERYCONDITIONS AS QUERY_CONDITIONS_, SUM(TT.ISGRANT) AS ISGRANT, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_Exclusion_Info EI WHERE EI.WORK_FLOW_NAME_A = '{workflownameparent}' and ei.work_flow_name_b = TT.KEY_ ) isreject FROM( SELECT DR.ID_ AS ID, '{sourceDesignerId}' AS SOURCEDESIGNERID, R.ID_ AS REJECTDESIGNERID, R.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME , R.TYPEPOSITION AS TYPEPOSITION, R.DISPLAY_NAME_ AS DISPLAYNAME, R.CODE_ AS CODE, R.KEY_ AS KEY_, R.VERSION_ AS VERSION, R.POSITION_ AS POSITION, R.DESCRIPTION_ AS DESCRIPTION, DR.QUERY_CONDITIONS_ AS QUERYCONDITIONS, (CASE WHEN D.ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ISGRANT FROM( SELECT TWR.ID_, TWR.DISPLAY_NAME_, TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_, TWR.KEY_, TWR.CODE_, TWR.POSITION_, TWR.KEY_ONE_, TWR.KEY_TWO_, TWR.KEY_THREE_, TWR.KEY_FOUR_, TWR.KEY_FIVE_, TWR.KEY_SIX_, TWR.KEY_SEVEN_, TWR.KEY_EIGHT_, TWR.KEY_NINE_, TWR.KEY_TEN_, TWR.VERSION_, TWR.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_, TWR.DESCRIPTION_, TWR.JPDL_VERSION_, TWR.CREATE_TIME_, TWR.UPDATE_TIME_, TWR.DEPLOYED_TIME_, TWR.MAX_DOT_X_, TWR.MAX_DOT_Y_, TWR.CREATE_DATE_, TWR.MODIFY_DATE_, TWR.TYPE_,TWR. CREATOR_, TWR.MODIFICATOR_, TDD.ID_ AS TYPEID, TDD.NAME_ AS TYPENAME, TDD.POSITION_ AS TYPEPOSITION FROM T_JBPM_DESIGNER_TRANSFER TWR LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS TDD ON TDD.ID_ = TWR.TYPE_ WHERE 1 = 1 /~queryText: AND ( UPPER(TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TWR.CODE_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.CODE_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.NAME_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' )~/ /~globalQueryText: AND ( UPPER(TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TWR.CODE_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.CODE_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' )~/
)R LEFT JOIN( SELECT ID_, QUERY_CONDITIONS_, KEYS_, PARAMS_, CREATE_DATE_, MODIFY_DATE_, SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_, REJECT_DESIGNER_ID_, CREATOR_, MODIFICATOR_ FROM T_WORKFLOWDESIGNERS_REJECTS WHERE SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' )DR ON R.ID_ = DR.REJECT_DESIGNER_ID_ LEFT JOIN( SELECT ID_ FROM T_JBPM_DESIGNER_TRANSFER WHERE ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' )D ON D.ID_= DR.SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_ )TT GROUP BY TT.ID,TT.REJECTDESIGNERID,TT.TYPENAME,TT.DISPLAYNAME,TT.CODE,TT.KEY_,TT.VERSION,TT.DESCRIPTION,TT.TYPEPOSITION,TT.POSITION,TT.QUERYCONDITIONS ORDER BY TT.TYPEPOSITION,TT.POSITION

sqlserver.table_sql:
SELECT TT.ID AS ID_, '{sourceDesignerId}' AS SOURCEDESIGNERID, '{workflownameparent}' as WORKFLOWNAMEPARENT, TT.REJECTDESIGNERID AS REJECTDESIGNERID, TT.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME_, TT.TYPEPOSITION AS TYPEPOSITION_, TT.POSITION AS POSITION_, TT.DISPLAYNAME AS DISPLAY_NAME_, TT.CODE AS CODE_, TT.KEY_ AS KEY_, TT.VERSION AS VERSION_, TT.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION_, TT.QUERYCONDITIONS AS QUERY_CONDITIONS_, SUM(TT.ISGRANT) AS ISGRANT, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_Exclusion_Info EI WHERE EI.WORK_FLOW_NAME_A = '{workflownameparent}' and ei.work_flow_name_b = TT.KEY_ ) isreject FROM( SELECT DR.ID_ AS ID, '{sourceDesignerId}' AS SOURCEDESIGNERID, R.ID_ AS REJECTDESIGNERID, R.TYPENAME AS TYPENAME , R.TYPEPOSITION AS TYPEPOSITION, R.DISPLAY_NAME_ AS DISPLAYNAME, R.CODE_ AS CODE, R.KEY_ AS KEY_, R.VERSION_ AS VERSION, R.POSITION_ AS POSITION, R.DESCRIPTION_ AS DESCRIPTION, DR.QUERY_CONDITIONS_ AS QUERYCONDITIONS, (CASE WHEN D.ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ISGRANT FROM( SELECT TWR.ID_, TWR.DISPLAY_NAME_, TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_, TWR.KEY_, TWR.CODE_, TWR.POSITION_, TWR.KEY_ONE_, TWR.KEY_TWO_, TWR.KEY_THREE_, TWR.KEY_FOUR_, TWR.KEY_FIVE_, TWR.KEY_SIX_, TWR.KEY_SEVEN_, TWR.KEY_EIGHT_, TWR.KEY_NINE_, TWR.KEY_TEN_, TWR.VERSION_, TWR.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_, TWR.DESCRIPTION_, TWR.JPDL_VERSION_, TWR.CREATE_TIME_, TWR.UPDATE_TIME_, TWR.DEPLOYED_TIME_, TWR.MAX_DOT_X_, TWR.MAX_DOT_Y_, TWR.CREATE_DATE_, TWR.MODIFY_DATE_, TWR.TYPE_,TWR. CREATOR_, TWR.MODIFICATOR_, TDD.ID_ AS TYPEID, TDD.NAME_ AS TYPENAME, TDD.POSITION_ AS TYPEPOSITION FROM T_JBPM_DESIGNER_TRANSFER TWR LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS TDD ON TDD.ID_ = TWR.TYPE_ WHERE 1 = 1 /~queryText: AND ( UPPER(TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TWR.CODE_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.CODE_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.NAME_) LIKE '%{queryText}%' )~/ /~globalQueryText: AND ( UPPER(TWR.WORKFLOW_NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TWR.CODE_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.CODE_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' OR UPPER(TDD.NAME_) LIKE '%{globalQueryText}%' )~/
)R LEFT JOIN( SELECT ID_, QUERY_CONDITIONS_, KEYS_, PARAMS_, CREATE_DATE_, MODIFY_DATE_, SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_, REJECT_DESIGNER_ID_, CREATOR_, MODIFICATOR_ FROM T_WORKFLOWDESIGNERS_REJECTS WHERE SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' )DR ON R.ID_ = DR.REJECT_DESIGNER_ID_ LEFT JOIN( SELECT ID_ FROM T_JBPM_DESIGNER_TRANSFER WHERE ID_='{sourceDesignerId}' )D ON D.ID_= DR.SOURCE_DESIGNER_ID_ )TT GROUP BY TT.ID,TT.REJECTDESIGNERID,TT.TYPENAME,TT.DISPLAYNAME,TT.CODE,TT.KEY_,TT.VERSION,TT.DESCRIPTION,TT.TYPEPOSITION,TT.POSITION,TT.QUERYCONDITIONS <EXTRACTEND> order by TYPEPOSITION_,POSITION_<EXTRACTEND>
